author: Simon Difford
description: Fruity and easy-drinking, yet with complexity from the gin. At least that's how this cocktail tastes when made with pomegranate juice freshly squeezed using a pillar press juicer. (1 pomegranate yields approx. 135ml juice.)
name: Full Circle

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
